Name Crit Effect Type
To your thinky Bits The target is stupefied 2 until healed. Bludgeoning
Clean Through Triple damage. Piercing
Wide Open The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn. Slashing
Hoarder's Wrath Triple damage to dragons. Double damage to all other creatures. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #30
